item.title: Chef InSpec (Compliance as Code)
item.description: Training Session Video Supporting website Here is the workshop material for the Open Security Summit session on the Chef Inspec for compliance Session slides Inspec See https://www.inspec.io/ website for more details on this tool Related sessions Chef Inspec Compliance as Code checks for those that can be checked Session Contents
